name: Soul Sword (HTML5)
description:
Soul Sword is a 2D platformer narrative set in the Ming Dynasty that follows Qiu Ye’s journey through grief as she endeavours to revive the love of her life. Only by exploring locations of her past and collecting enough souls can she activate the Sword of Resurrection. Each land unveils the intricate history between Qiu Ye and Ruo Lian by reminiscing artefacts and relics that connect them to the people and world of Soul Sword.

///* HTML5 Version might have lag and frames drop. *///

///* Please download the Windows Executable version for the best experience. *///
